name: Arcade Hits: Raiden
overview: The big hit shooting game “RAIDEN” has finally appears to Downloadable Games! The transplant has been done by the same arcade development team with high completeness! You can enjoy the same quality as the arcade version at home. Furthermore to enjoy the arcade atmosphere，the vertical screen mode is included. A great game balance and elaborate graphic will give you a special kick out feeling by just doing the simple “Dodge and Shoot”. Please sense the inherited “RAIDEN” soul bodily by all means!
